Mod.name: Mould
Mod.description:
Mould
Aims to give incentives and rewards for hunting monsters and bosses.
Current Features: - 20 new wands to find - 3 new starting wands - 4 perks are now drops from specific enemies or bosses - Changes to 2 bosses - Find and use Hiisi weapons - 5 tiers of Archaeology featuring 20 items - 1 new Sun to make (and a new essence) - 3 new spells
Planned Features: - features
Github: https://github.com/mole-den/mould-n-noita Discord: https://discord.gg/JuRC6FqXkb
